name: Shikaku Adventure
description:
Shikaku Adventure is a simple and relaxing puzzle game for all ages.You can start with simple level (4x4) ad improve your experience with hard level (10x10).

If you love spending your time keeping your mind trained Shikaku Adventure is the game for you.

HOW TO PLAY
+ Draw over the grid a rectangle for each top number.The cells number must be equal to the number.
+ The rectangle can be dived in rows and columns, the cells number must be equal to the top number.
+ The level is completed when the grid is completely filled and each rectangle match the top number

FEATURES
+ Easy, intuitive controls.
+ More than 800 levels with different difficulties.
+ Nice graphics and sounds.
+ Game is free, no purchase required no advertisement is present
+ Suitable with kids and children.
